sense.def:
Ptica ali druga žival, ki je
tame
, se ne boji ljudi in ni nasilna do njih.

seg.quote: These measures are unlikely to be accepted as tamely as the government hopes.

sense.def:
Dejavnost, ki jo opišemo kot
tame
, se nam ne zdi zanimiva, ker ni povezana z razburljivim dogajanjem.

seg.quote: It sounded like a rather tame party.

sense.def:
To tame wild animals or uncontrolled people or things
pomeni prisiliti k poslušnosti ali obvladati divje živali, osebe, ki se vedejo podivjano, ali stvari, ki nas ogrožajo.
